name: Soft Sensor App
description:
The Hands-on Portal Digital Dashboard Soft Sensor Application Webble

Old Hands-on Portal application using the old version of the DigitalDashboard.

This Webble app loads a few DigitalDashboard components, connects them, and loads some data. Sets up a visualization environment to show two different modelling methods dealing with sensor failures in a chemical plant with many different sensors.
keywords: DigitalDashboard,Hands-on Portal,hop,soft sensors,modelling,linear regression,chemical plant,visualization,coordinated views
author: legacyDigitalDashboard
